North_Las_Vegas.Las Vegas Premium Outlets North:
Las Vegas Premium Outlets North is a 540,000-square-foot (50,000 m2) shopping mall located near Downtown Las Vegas located on 40 acres (16 ha). It is owned and managed by Simon Property Group, and part of Simon's Premium Outlets family of outlet malls.


== History ==
The mall opened in August, 2003 with 435,000 square feet (40,400 m2) of space.
